channel.title: [PI] Adding custom items issue [Rep++]
channel.description:
1) Anyone know why a custom item would become invis when added? I added the spirit shield set, for some reason, all of them seemed to work except the Elysian Spirit Shield, which I do not understand why and i checked it over a few times.
2) Some like body armor looked weird when you wear them. Like the whole body isn't covered.
